posts.post_content:
4 really nice eye appeal cards here.  $8 for shipping and insurance for 1 or more.  All prices are net (check, money order, Paypal friends and family) to me.  Add 3% for Paypal goods and services or credit card.  Prices are subject to change without notice.  “I’ll take it” trumps any negotiations or offers.  PM or email me at [url]hcv123@att.net[/url]  to reserve.  I collect sales tax from NY state residents.

Konetchy  SGC 4   125
Tooley      SGC 4   175
Needham  SGC 4   135
Crandall   SGC 5.5 175
